thread.title: Nice boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Nice boutique hotel - Review of The Westbourne Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LinaChanddra
title: Nice boutique hotel
text: We stayed four nights and booked for 3 rooms. First the two double bedroom was given on 2nd floor and very small size that we can't putbour luggages. But on the next day one room is upgraded to a bigger one . The kitchen set on every room is really helpful for us to warm some meals. But on our third night a fire alarm struck around 3.30 am and so we rushed down . Only one staircases is available! Later we were informed that was not real fire but someone had taken shower with hot water that makes the fire alarm alerts ! And the fire alarm repeated twice that night which is quite disturbing our sleep. I hope that they had repair so the fire alarm in the shower not to sensitive ! The location is good many small cafes and shops and just 5 minutes walk to hyde park or paddington station.
